Cr1.MC.No. 214 of 2019 2 2019/KER/1068
ORDER

Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. Petitioner is the accused in
C.C.No.419 of 2018 on the file of the Judicial
Magistrate of First Class, Payyannur. She is
alleged to have committed the offences under
Sections 201, 406 and 420 £42=IPC. Second
respondent is the President of the
Co-operative Society. She is the victim in
the case. It is submitted that the matter has
been settled and the proceedings in the trial
court may be quashed.

3. Heard the learned counsel for the
petitioner and the second respondent and the
learned Public Prosecutor.

4. The petitioner was temporary Secretary
of the Peringome Vanitha Sahakarana Sangham of
which the second respondent is the present

Biel
Crl.MC.No. 214 of 2019 3 2019 /KERITO68
President. The petitioner allegedly
misappropriated certain amount belonging to
the Society and cheated it. T have perused
the affidavit filed by the second respondent.
I am satisfied that the matter has been
settled and no public interest is involved in
it. There is no legal impediment for quashing
the proceedings.
In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed.

The proceedings in C.C.No.419 of 2018 on the
file of the Judicial Magistrate of First
Class, Payyannur are quashed.

Sd/-

K.ABRAHAM MATHEW

JUDGE

MC/10.01.19
